page.title: 12Shopping
page.content: From our school window we can see a variety of shops including a butchers, an electrical shop, a Co-op and a shoe shop. Shopping is an essential part of present day life because people shop nearly every day. We haven't any fields of our own and we need to buy things from other parts of the country, or from other countries of the world. Gillingham's fields havs been built on with many buildings. I enjoy shopping very much. The best bit I like about shopping is looking at all the different things that I like, but I don't like my Mum dragging me about which I hate. Shopping is very local to everyone (I like shopping and I'm sure everyone else does as well) in this part of Gillingham.
